Description:
We are looking for a skilled and personable Receptionist to join our team in Doha, Qatar. The ideal candidate will have at least 3 years of experience in a similar role and possess excellent communication and organizational skills. As a Receptionist, you will be the first point of contact for our company, providing a warm and professional welcome to all visitors and guests. You will also be responsible for managing phone calls, scheduling appointments, and performing various administrative tasks. The successful candidate will have a friendly and approachable demeanor, with the ability to multitask and prioritize effectively.Responsibilities:Welcome and greet visitors and guests in a professional and friendly manner
Answer and manage incoming phone calls, redirecting calls as necessary
Schedule appointments and maintain calendars for multiple staff members
Receive and distribute mail and packages
Ensure the reception area is tidy and presentable at all times
Coordinate with other departments to ensure smooth operations
Perform general administrative tasks, such as filing, photocopying, and data entry
Maintain office supplies and place orders as needed
Handle sensitive information with confidentiality and discretion
Assist with event planning and coordinationSkills
